content_blocks.title: Incident Response Process

content.text: This lesson covers IR lifecycle, Preparation, Detection, Containment, Eradication, Recovery. You'll learn the fundamentals and practical applications.

content_blocks.simplified_explanation: Think of this like IR lifecycle in everyday life...
content_blocks.real_world_connection: In real-world scenarios, IR lifecycle is used daily by security professionals.
content_blocks.reflection_prompt: What questions do you have about this topic?

post_assessment.question: What is the first phase of incident response?
post_assessment.explanation: Preparation comes first - having plans, tools, and training BEFORE incidents occur.
